item.title: The Future of Machine Learning is not Python, it's SQL
item.description: Python is touted as the language to learn and use for DS and ML thanks to its easy to understand syntax making it quick to write, free and open-source for simple adoption, vast DS & ML toolset making you spoilt for choice, and large community ready to help. However, there are many cracks which start to show when using Python in production.
